DataSource.query:
select 
*
from
(

SELECT

distinct
'A_Sonstige',
replace('A_'||NVL(VVS,'NA'),'A_0','A_NA'),
'AVS',
'N',
vvs

FROM
dtl_nvr_ertraege e

WHERE
stichtag=(select stichtag from nvr_parameter)
and vvs is not NULL
AND herkunft <>'DTL_NVR_PROVISIONEN'

UNION

SELECT

distinct
'A_Sonstige',
replace('A_'||NVL(VVS,'NA'),'A_0','A_NA'),
'AVS',
'N',
vvs

FROM
dtl_nvr_provisionen_neu p

WHERE
stichtag=(select stichtag from nvr_parameter)
and vvs is not NULL
)
